page.title: 16EDUCATION, SUNNYSIDES
page.content:
{
An interview with{Mrs. Francis}; { { Sunnyside opened as a children's home in 1920 but previous to that,from 1907 to 1920 it was a private house.In 1920 it was a normal home for ophans,waifs and strays as they were called then.Then myself and Joyce were trained as nannies.From 1969 and on it has been for the mentally handicapped children,lots of them grown up, so at the moment their ages are from 11 to 21. Mealtimes are flexible because we try to make home life as normal as possible.
